thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 17 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Ashmore Says Became Aware Of Sale Of Assets Of Bedfordbury

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ashmore Says Became Aware Of Sale Of Assets Of Bedfordbury
text:
April 17 (Reuters) - Ashmore Global Opportunities Ltd :
* BOARD BECAME AWARE OF SALE OF SUBSTANTIALLY ALL OF ASSETS OF BEDFORDBURY TO WHICH IT HAS INDIRECT EXPOSURE THROUGH ITS FUND INVESTMENTS
* AGREED PRICE OF SALE WAS MARGINALLY ABOVE LATEST VALUATION ATTRIBUTED TO ASSET BY COMPANY.
* INDIRECT EXPOSURE TO BEDFORDBURY REPRESENTS JUST OVER 32% OF COMPANYâ€™S NAV AS AT 31 DECEMBER 2017
* ALL CASH PROCEEDS HAVE BEEN RECEIVED BY BEDFORDBURY; ANTICIPATED THAT CASH WILL BE UPSTREAMED TO AGOL DURING Q2 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
